page.title: 07Housing in Joydens Wood
page.content: Nearly 3000 semi-detached houses & bungalows, have been built since 1950. Some detached properties have existed since 1930 & occasional small sites are still being developed. Most of the properties are privately owned, including those on a small council estate. Three parades of small shops, totalling 22, independantly owned, provide most of the immediate needs of the community. Dartford, Swanley and Bexleyheath provide more extensive facilities. There is a very modern church. Most residents commute to London by train and/or car A residents association, community centre, Nursery School, playgroup, Senior Citizens group, women's clubs, scout, guide, cub & brownie packs & a football club thrive. Adult education & recreation facilities are provided by J Green.
